content.rendered:
Crafting Flavors, Celebrating Community.Explore our unique brews and local favorites.

BEER LIST

Crafting Flavors, Celebrating Community.Explore our unique brews and local favorites.

BEER LIST

BEHIND THE BREWS

AT MAIN CHANNEL

Best ingredients
Sourced locally for unparalleled quality and freshness, each sip tells a rich story of community and craftsmanship.
Our Beers
Dive into a world of unique flavors, classic favorites, and exciting new adventures crafted with passion.
Our process
Our meticulous brewing methods combine age-old traditions with modern innovation to craft the perfect brew every time.
Story behind
Every batch has a tale, deeply rooted in inspired beginnings and carefully crafted with passion until the final pour.

Crafted with Care, Served with Pride.EVERY BEER

TELLS A TALE

LEARN OUR STORY

SEASONAL SPECIALS

Explore our seasonal and new release brews, crafted to embrace the spirit of each season. From the bright zest of summer ales to the rich warmth of winter stouts, our limited-time selections offer a taste of the changing seasons. Experience the flavors that define each time of year, including our latest creations that capture the essence of now.
Limited edition Celtic Crossing
Set sail on a smooth current of flavor with celtic crossing, our bold irish red ale. Flowing with notes of caramel sweetness and a hint of roasted barley, it's as rich and deep as the waters of the emerald isle. Raise a glass and let the malty waves carry you to a perfect finish.
New Release Jitney Juice Hazy IPA
Dive into the hazy depths of our latest IPA, bursting with a citrus trio of orange, pineapple, and grapefruit. Each sip of Jitney Juice promises a tropical escape, perfectly balanced with a hoppy finish. Get ready to tantalize your taste buds with this juicy, hazy delight.

BEST INGREDIENTS

Hops

The essence of aroma and
bitterness in each brew.

VIEW MORE
Yeast

The crucial fermenter, shaping
distinct flavors and profiles.

VIEW MORE
Barley

Foundational to our beers,
adding color and complexity.

VIEW MORE

MEET THE

BREW MASTER

Crafting Quality, Pour by Pour

I believe in beer that tells a story, a story of dedication and community. Each batch is a testament to our commitment to excellence and innovation in brewing. It’s not just about the brew itself; it’s about creating moments that bring people together. So, every sip you take is part of a larger narrative, one that I am proud to share with you.

BREW MASTERTYKE JORDAN

MEET THE CREW

Discover the passionate team behind our exceptional craft beers.

Jeff Gossage

General Manager

Prentice Satterfield

Sales Manager

Brian Satterfield

Cellar Operator

Click on each location for details.

We're in Guntersville,

Alabama

Stop by, say hello,
at our original location.
Come for the beer, stay for the laughs.

2090 Gunter Ave, Guntersville AL 35976
Mon-Thurs 3-9, Friday 3-10, Sat 12-10, Sun 12-10
(256) 960-5070
beer@mainchannelbrewing.com

Visit us in Albertville,

Alabama

Our second location,
we are open every day
from 1PM to 10PM.

210 Sand Mountain Dr, Albertville, AL 35950
Tues-Thurs 11-9, Friday 11-10, Sat 12-10, Closed Sunday and Monday
(256) 660-0335
beer@mainchannelbrewing.com
